body_html:
@d0k spent some time looking at this. He was able to reproduce the high loss, with both XLA:GPU and XLA:CPU. Still unclear what's going on.

One question for you is, do you have a way we can reproduce the Check failed: status == CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS (7 vs. 0) error? That may be separate.
body_text:
@d0k spent some time looking at this.  He was able to reproduce the high loss, with both XLA:GPU and XLA:CPU.  Still unclear what's going on.
One question for you is, do you have a way we can reproduce the Check failed: status == CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS (7 vs. 0) error?  That may be separate.
body:
@d0k spent some time looking at this.  He was able to reproduce the high loss, with both XLA:GPU *and* XLA:CPU.  Still unclear what's going on.

One question for you is, do you have a way we can reproduce the `Check failed: status == CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS (7 vs. 0)` error?  That may be separate.
